name: Factory Escape (TheZilanze)
description:
Story:

One night you and your friends decided to explore the old factory outside of town. While there you were surprised when a criminal gang showed up to the factory. After falling and passing out you wake up to realise that you are alone and that your friends have abandoned you. You now need to find a way to sneak past the criminals and escape the factory.

Entry for mini jam 65.

Theme: Abandoned
Limitation: No screen shake

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Font: 

Peter Hull

https://fonts.google.com/specimen/VT323?category=Monospace
